description.@en: The element of surprise guarantees advantage and I seize the opportunity whenever it presents itself. Danger lurks everywhere and in everyone. I will be the first to strike so that I will never be a victim of evil again.

effect.@en: When using Words As Weapons in combat, you may flip the results to succeed at Skill Tests. However, whenever you are the victim of the negative effects of Words As Weapons, you suffer from Stress.
